forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. Areas of smoke and haze are possible, reducing visibility at times. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High near 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
